attributes.action: not allow our home and mobile phone records to be accessed by 795 public bodies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The new rules compel phone companies to retain information, however private, about all landline and mobile calls, and make them available to some 795 public bodies, including the Food Standards Agency, the Department of Health, the Immigration Service, the Gaming Board and the Charity Commission. why???
how do we know that this information is not going to be missused??
i have nothing to hide but why should this personal information be given to organisations that dont need it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
